index.adminMsg: Here is the Latitude and Longitude from the database
index.msg1: Now that you have logged in, here is what you can expect from each page of this website!
index.msg2: The Home Page is simply a way for you to read up and get accustumed to the website! It will offer documentation and the general usage.
index.msg3: The Map page is your way of looking up all the locations that were posted around the world, and should you accept you share your location, the map will center on you and show you the latitude and longitude so you can copy them and upload your own location!
index.msg4: The Upload page is where you can upload a location yourself! With the latitude and longitude you got from the map or searched online, you can write the city name, a description, and give us a nice picture from your phone or browser, and all you have to do is click sumbit! This will send the location to our database, and allow the map to read it so other users can have a look at what you posted!
index.please: Please Log in using the Header

dynamicmap.prompt: Do you want to enable location services?
dynamicmap.nosupport: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

uploading.sorry: Submittion Failed, You have letters inside Latitude or Longitude!

legal.legalText1: Mongeese Map is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. As part of this commitment, we want to be transparent about the use of cookies and the data we collect when you visit our website.
legal.legalText2: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you browse websites. These cookies help us analyze website traffic, customize content, and improve user experience. We use cookies provided by third-party services such as Google Analytics.
legal.legalText3: We use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ('Google'). Google Analytics uses cookies to help us analyze how users interact with our website. The information generated by these cookies (including your IP address) is transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. Google uses this information to evaluate your use of our website, compile reports on website activity for website operators, and provide other services relating to website activity and internet usage.
legal.legalText4: By using our website, you consent to the processing of data about you by Google in the manner described in Google's Privacy Policy and for the purposes set out above. You can opt-out of Google Analytics if you disable or refuse the cookie, disable JavaScript, or use the opt-out service provided by Google.
legal.legalText5: By clicking on 'Allow', you consent to the collection and use of cookies. If you do no agree with this statement, please click on 'Decline' when prompted to set your cookie preferences.
legal.legalText6: We may update this GDPR compliance statement to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any updates will be posted on this page.
legal.legalText7: If you have any questions about our GDPR compliance statement or your personal information, please contact us at teamMongeese@solent.ac.uk.
legal.legalText8: Thank you for visiting Mongeese Map.
